snippet: When Linda Evangelista went to court seeking child support, she dressed like the successful model she is, not a prim single mother in financial need.
abstract: Linda Evangelista comes off more as the successful model she is than a prim single mother in financial need, turning courtroom into a kind of high-end catwalk while seeking child support from French luxury-goods magnate Francois-Henri Pinault.
lead_paragraph: When Linda Evangelista went to court seeking child support, she dressed like the successful model she is, not a prim single mother in financial need.

headline.seo: Linda Evangelista Goes to Court Dressed Like a Star
headline.main: Single Mom in Need? Not the Look
headline.print_headline: Single Mom In Need? Not the Look
